channel.title: Assignments on Modern Research Methods:
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on Modern Research Methods:

item.title: Final project
item.description: For your final project, you will perform some (hypothetical) economic analyses and use your newfound vocabulary and skills to make a recommendation. You will submit two files on Learning Suite: A PDF of of a 2â€“3-page memo An Excel file with your technical appendix You will be graded based on the rubric posted linked below. Though there are correct answers for the different market equilibria and the differential effects of taxes across states and firms, there is no one correct recommendation.

item.title: Assignment 0: Intro to R and RStudio
item.description: Objectives By the end of this assignment, you should: understand how to interact with Rstudio know the parts of a R Markdown file and how to knit know how to submit an assignment. understand how to load a package. understand how to read a help file. understand some basic R commands There are 10 simple exercises in this lab. The goal is to turn in this assignment at the end of lab today.

item.title: Assignment 0: Intro to R and RStudio
item.description: Objectives By the end of this assignment, you should: understand how to interact with Rstudio know the parts of a R Markdown file and how to knit know how to submit an assignment. understand how to load a package. understand how to read a help file. understand some basic R commands There are 10 simple exercises in this lab. The goal is to turn in this assignment at the end of lab today.

item.title: Assignment 0: Intro to R and RStudio
item.description: Exercise 1: 365 * 112 365 times 112 is [YOUR RESPONSE HERE]. Exercise 2-3: No response required. Exercise 4: Load Arbuthnot data arbuthnot <- read_csv("data/arbuthnot.csv") # code for Exercise 4 is already entered below as an example arbuthnot$girls Exercise 5: # enter your code for Exercise 5 here [WRITE YOUR RESPONSE HERE] Exercise 6: # enter your code here [WRITE YOUR RESPONSE HERE] Exercise 7: [WRITE YOUR RESPONSE HERE]
